nodes.name: Start1
dialogue: Date: I didn't think you'd be taking me somewhere so... expensive. Adultress: Well, I'm only in town for a few days, hon, so I figured: why not live big? Besides, I hear their beds are... (quieter) quite comfortable. Date: I guess we'll have to see for ourselves. Adultress: Floor three, doorman! Erh, floor... man?

toNode: How to ruin a day in 30 seconds

nodes.name: How to ruin a day in 30 seconds
dialogue: Date: Are you sure this was worth the expense? Adultress: They didn't exactly advertise 'rude waitstaff.' I shoulda checked Yelp. Date: That certainly puts the kibosh on that loving feeling. Adultress: Hey, no, we'll get it going again, hon. First this asswipe's gotta apologize. Are you sorry?

nodes.name: Nice date
dialogue: Adultress: Well, thank you! We are a fine-looking couple if I do say so myself. Date: I've never felt more perfectly matched, it feels like we're a 1:1 ratio. Adultress: (Sarcastic) Poetic. Date: How about you, do you think we're the one-to-one?

nodes.name: Employee of the month
dialogue: Date: It's kinda creepy how they just stare, isn't it? Adultress: It's part of the code. They can't say anything when within the confines of the elevator. It's a sort of sacred space. Weird, huh? Date: Yeah. How do you know so much about this place anyway? Adultress: Oh, they... uh, put little guidebooks in the room. History and stuff. Read it while trying to get to sleep last night. Date: I'd like to take a look. Adultress: Well, I don't think you'll have much time for reading tonight. Besides, I may have thrown it out.

nodes.name: Black eye
dialogue: Date: You'd treat a lady like that? Why, I've got half a mind to sock you good, maybe that'll teach you some respect. Adultress: No need for that. I know the manager, I'll just tell him he accidentally hired a moron. Date: Why d'you know the manager? Adultress: Uh... family friend? Let's just get off here. Date: Fine.

nodes.name: Mixed signals
dialogue: Adultress: Givin' us worse mixed signals than bent rabbit ears. Date: And she knows a thing or two about mixed signals. Adultress: What's that supposed to mean? Date: Aren't you a broadcast technician? Adultress: Oh, yeah. Right. Just take us to the third floor.

nodes.name: Perfect employee
dialogue: Date: You know, if I just don't look directly at them they kinda disappear in the peripheral vision. Adultress: I think that's how it's supposed to work. Date: Ephemeral. Ghosts whose sole purpose is to transport you between realms. Adultress: You mean floors? Date: I was thinking more a River Styx type situation, but yes.

nodes.name: Cinderella Story
dialogue: Adultress: Well, it certainly has been a good date. Date: The lobster brisque was particularly exquisite. Adultress: Lobster bisque. Date: That too. Adultress: And your service has been exemplary. I'll put a good word in with the manager. Date: You know him? Adultress: ...We're penpals.

nodes.name: Jealous
dialogue: Date: Now why would you go and say something like that? Adultress: I've got a hunch. Date: And I love you all the same. Adultress: What? I mean about why. Date: Er, right. Adultress: You're just jealous aren't you? You'll never be happy so no one else can, huh?

nodes.name: Friendly
dialogue: Adultress: Hey, I get it, everyone has their off days. Sorry we came along at the wrong time, thanks for taking us to our floor. Date: Yeah, I guess when it comes down to it, you get the job done. Adultress: Well, that job is just moving a lever, so... Date: Don't we all just move levers in the machine of life? Adultress: Oh, you're so deep! Let's plumb some of those depths, in private. Date: Au revoir!

Adultress: Glad we got that misunderstanding dealt with. Date: It can be hard to parse your hand wiggles. I'm not fluent in... hand language. Adultress: Let's get off here, I can give you some lessons.

Adultress: Glad we got that misunderstanding dealt with. Date: It can be hard to parse your hand wiggles. I'm not fluent in... hand language. Adultress: Let's get off here, I can give you some lessons.

nodes.name: Ideal worker
dialogue: Date: Is there anyone even here? Or is it only an automaton guiding us? Adultress: I think it's just a really good employee. Date: I feel as if we've crossed through a boundary of some sort. The world seems different somehow. Adultress: Right, okay. Let's just get to the room, yeah?

nodes.name: Wedding invitation
dialogue: Date: Hey, keep up the good work and maybe you'll get an invite to the wedding! Adultress: Don't you think we might be getting a bit ahead of ourselves? Date: Right, sorry, I'm just excited. Adultress: Thank you, though.
